id: Disneyland Resort Horses Materialize at the Anaheim Halloween Parade
paragraph:
by Donna Fisk, Public Relations Manager, Disneyland ResortWhen shadows lengthen and bats fly out of a horse trailer, you know it’s time for the annual Anaheim Halloween Parade!This past Saturday, Disneyland Resort horses Bug and Finn, pulled a ghoulish black carriage and Circle D cast members donned Haunted Mansion costumes to add to the spooky-fun spirit. Inside the carriage was none other than Mickey Mouse in his vampire finery, along with Disneyland Resort Ambassador Alexa Garcia. A community tradition since 1924, the Anaheim Halloween Parade provides an opportunity for young and old to enjoy an evening of unique entertainment and camaraderie.Destinations: Disneyland Resortby Thomas Smith, Editorial Content Director, Disney Parksby Ryan March, Editor, Disney Vacation Club’s Disney Files Magazineby Kevin Rafferty, Jr., External Communications Manager, Disneyland ResortFood & Beverage Content Relations Coordinatorby Donna Fisk, Public Relations Manager, Disneyland Resort
